Name: 7-Day Medication Adherence
HowToEarn:
Earn a badge for every medications you take.

1. Daily Mark your medication as 'Taken' by swiping left in the Medication Reminders.
You can also mark the medication as 'taken' in the To Do's.

2. For 7 consistent days take your medications and earn a badge.
